Academic.name: Academic
Academic.desc: Academics do exactly as the name suggests. They study hard, or teach hard, using their intelligence and experience to do their jobs.
Academic.saves: You are Proficient in Intelligence and Constitution Saving Throws.

custom.name: Academic Studies
custom.desc: You have Proficiency in two of the following: Grit, Investigation, Knowledge, Science or Supernatural.

Academic.alt: Proficiency in three additional languages or Expertise in a skill that you're already Proficient in.

Artist.name: Artist
Artist.desc: Using a variety of mediums, Artists create beautiful things to invoke feelings in people. Whether it be a comic, a painting, a sculpture, or a heartfelt performance, Artists spend hours honing their craft.
Artist.saves: You are Proficient in Dexterity and Intelligence Saving Throws.

custom.name: Artist's Soul
custom.desc: You have Proficiency in two of the following: Finesse, Medicine, Perception, or Presence.

Artist.alt: Proficiency in two sets of tools, three instruments, or Expertise in a skill, tool, or instrument that you're already Proficient in.

Athlete.name: Athlete
Athlete.desc: People who push their bodies to and past their physical limits in order to see the true potential of humanity.
Athlete.saves: You are Proficient in two of the following Saving Throws: Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution.

custom.name: Athletic Experience
custom.desc: You have Proficiency in two of the following: Athletics, Acrobatics, Finesse, Grit, Medicine, or Presence.

Athlete.alt: Expertise in a skill that you're already Proficient in.

Con_Artist.name: Con Artist
Con_Artist.desc: Those who steal for their own greed. To attain power, money, or influence, these people take advantage of the Human brain in order to push other people to achieve their own goals.
Con_Artist.saves: You are Proficient in Charisma and Wisdom Saving Throws.

custom.name: Award-Winning Smile
custom.desc: You have Proficiency in two of the following: Bluff, Finesse, Supernatural, or Vibe

Con_Artist.alt: Proficiency in two sets of tools or Expertise in a skill that you're already Proficient in.

Hard_Laborer.name: Hard Laborer
Hard_Laborer.desc: Some people make a living performing physically taxing jobs. Without them, society would not function.
Hard_Laborer.saves: You are Proficient in Constitution and Strength Saving Throws.

custom.name: Grit
custom.desc: You have Proficiency in two of the following: Athletics, Care, Grit, or Intimidate.

Hard_Laborer.alt: Proficiency in three additional languages, two sets of artisan tools, or Expertise in a skill that you're already Proficient in.

Leader.name: Leader
Leader.desc: Leaders are those who are able to sway others to help them perform great deeds, whether they be selfish or selfless. They are able to take charge of a situation and guide others along a specific path.
Leader.saves: You are Proficient in two of the following Saving Throws: Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma.

custom.name: Leadership Experience
custom.desc: You have Proficiency in two of the following: Bluff, Diplomacy, Perception, Presence, Supernatural, or Vibe

Leader.alt: Expertise in a skill that you're already Proficient in.

Performer.name: Performer
Performer.desc: Those who perfect a craft in order to inspire, but also to hear the roar of the crowd.
Performer.saves: You are Proficient in Charisma and Constitution Saving Throws.

custom.name: Crowd Pleaser
custom.desc: You have Proficiency in two of the following: Acrobatics, Bluff, Diplomacy, or Presence.

Performer.alt: Proficiency in two sets of tools, three instruments, or Expertise in a skill, tool, or instrument that you're already Proficient in.

Medical_Expert.name: Medical Expert
Medical_Expert.desc: Medical Experts use their superior intellect, reasoning, and patience to assist the injured. Medical Experts have immense knowledge of anatomy, knowing how living things function in almost every way.
Medical_Expert.saves: You are Proficient in Intelligence and Wisdom Saving Throws.

custom.name: Medical Experience
custom.desc: You have Proficiency in two of the following: Care, Finesse, Investigation, or Medicine.

Medical_Expert.alt: Proficiency in two sets of tools or Expertise in a skill that you're already Proficient in.

Hospitality_Worker.name: Hospitality Worker
Hospitality_Worker.desc: A person who makes their living serving people, using their using their mind and their social skills to help them.
Hospitality_Worker.saves: You are Proficient in Charisma and Intelligence Saving Throws.

custom.name: People Person
custom.desc: You have Proficiency in two of the following: Diplomacy, Investigation, Perception, or Vibe.

Hospitality_Worker.alt: Proficiency in three additional languages, two sets of artisan tools, or Expertise in a skill that you're already Proficient in.

Student.name: Student
Student.desc: Students aim to learn about and gain experience in a wide variety of things, exploring what they'd like to do with their future.
Student.saves: You are Proficient in any two Saving Throws of your choice.
Student.ability: You get +2 to one stat of your choice, +1 to three stats of your choice, and -1 to two stats of your choice.

custom.name: Constant Improvement
custom.desc: You have Proficiency in any five Skills of your choice.

Student.alt: Proficiency in three additional languages, two sets of tools, or three instruments.

Survivalist.name: Survivalist
Survivalist.desc: Someone who has chosen to forgo most parts of modern society, instead choosing to live a simpler, more reclusive life.
Survivalist.saves: You are Proficient in Wisdom and Constitution Saving Throws.

custom.name: Will to Thrive
custom.desc: You have Proficiency in two of the following: Care, Grit, Perception, Survival, or Vibe.

Survivalist.alt: Proficiency in two sets of tools or Expertise in a skill that you're already Proficient in.

Thief.name: Thief
Thief.desc: Those who must make a living taking from the more fortunate. Through Stealth, Intimidate, or Speed, Thieves take to sustain the needs of themselves or those they hold close.
Thief.saves: You are Proficient in Dexterity and Charisma Saving Throws.

custom.name: Street Smarts
custom.desc: You have Proficiency in two of the following: Bluff, Finesse, Intimidate, Perception, or Sneak.

Thief.alt: Proficiency in two sets of tools or Expertise in a skill that you're already Proficient in.

Trained_Laborer.name: Trained Laborer
Trained_Laborer.desc: Someone who has studied for years in order to hone their craft. They use their Strength along with their experience in order to accomplish their tasks.
Trained_Laborer.saves: You are Proficient in Strength and Intelligence Saving Throws.

custom.name: Labor Experience
custom.desc: You have Proficiency in two of the following: Athletics, Finesse, Grit, Investigation, or Science.

Trained_Laborer.alt: Proficiency in two sets of tools or Expertise in a skill that you're already Proficient in.

Warrior.name: Warrior
Warrior.desc: People of discipline who devote their lives training in the field of combat. Some fight to protect, while others might do so for selfish reasons.
Warrior.saves: You are Proficient in Dexterity and Constitution Saving Throws.

custom.name: Soldier's Discipline
custom.desc: You have Proficiency in two of the following: Athletics, Acrobatics, Grit, Perception, Sneak.

Warrior.alt: Proficiency in Simple weapons or three weapons of your choice, or Expertise in a skill or weapon that you're already Proficient in.

Chef.name: Chef
Chef.desc: Those who make a living creating wonderful food for people. These people work with extreme patience and resilience to make culinary wonders.
Chef.saves: You are Proficient in Constitution and Wisdom Saving Throws.

custom.name: Culinary Experience
custom.desc: You have Proficiency in two of the following: Athletics, Finesse, Grit, Perception, or Survival.

Chef.alt: Proficiency in two sets of tools, or Expertise in a skill/tool that you're already Proficient in.

Scientist.name: Scientist
Scientist.desc: Those who make a living pushing the frontiers of science through calculations and experimentation.
Scientist.saves: You are Proficient in Dexterity and Intelligence Saving Throws.

custom.name: Scientific Research
custom.desc: You have Proficiency in two of the following:   Finesse, Investigation, Knowledge, Medicine, Science, or Supernatural.

Scientist.alt: Proficiency in two sets of tools of your choice or Expertise in a skill/tool that you're already Proficient in.

Weightlifter.name: Weightlifter
Weightlifter.desc: Those who work on their physique for muscle mass or pure strength. These people work diligently to not only keep in top shape, but to be able to show the work of their labors off.
Weightlifter.saves: You are Proficient in Strength and Charisma Saving Throws.

custom.name: Powerful Performance
custom.desc: You have Proficiency in two of the following: Athletics, Acrobatics, Grit, Intimidate, Medicine, or Presence.

Weightlifter.alt: Expertise in a skill that you're already Proficient in.
